articles.title: Airbnb Goes Hollywood With Plans to Rent X-Men Mansion, ‘Up’ Home, ‘Purple Rain’ House and More - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The travel and tech firm is launching an 'Icons' program, letting users book a visit to a comedy show with Kevin Hart, a night at the Ferrari museum, or a stay in fictional locales.
articles.content:
The mansion, sitting atop a hill in Westchester County, New York, could be mistaken for any number of homes in the area, save for one little, er, big, thing.

articles.author: Ben Turner
articles.title: Stunning image shows atoms transforming into quantum waves — just as Schrödinger predicted - Livescience.com
articles.description: A new imaging technique, which captured frozen lithium atoms transforming into quantum waves, could be used to probe some of the most poorly understood aspects of the quantum world.
articles.content:
For the first time ever, physicists have captured a clear image of individual atoms behaving like a wave.
The image shows sharp red dots of fluorescing atoms transforming into fuzzy blobs of wave pa… [+3197 chars]
